layout_choice: Single-column layout to enhance readability on mobile devices.
color_strategy: Primary color #4BFF7E for calls to action and headers; accent colors for highlights and background variations.
typography_decisions: Use of Arial, sans-serif for modern and clean look; emphasis on clear hierarchy between headings and body text.
component_structure: Component-based approach to ensure modular design and easy updates for future campaigns.
responsive_approach: Designed for mobile-first; tested breakpoints for tablet and desktop compatibility.
accessibility_measures: Color contrast and alt text implemented for images to ensure WCAG AA compliance.
performance_optimizations: Optimized images for faster loading times; combined and minified CSS where applicable.
client_compatibility: Ensured compatibility with Gmail, Outlook, Apple Mail, Yahoo Mail for broad reach.
